name: txtUas
overview:
Fun anonymous text messaging service.

Have you ever wanted to send an anonymous sms, a secret valentines text message? or an anonymous text message to a child at christmas from Santa ? Now you can!, and that is exactly what txtUas allows you to do. Simply type in the mobile phone number you wish to send it to, type your message, then choose what name you want to come up on their phone when they receive the text message.

No number will will show up on their phone, just the senderID you choose. The reciever can even reply without knowing who sent the original message.

Registration is FREE and works with all UK mobile phones and networks.
